title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.4 - Control of visitors by employee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 51.4 - Control of visitors by employee

State Regulations

An employee assigned to conduct visitors through the
correctional facility shall require them to refrain from giving anything to or
receiving anything from inmates; from loud talking or boisterous conduct; and
from loitering along the way or separating themselves from the group or the
employee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
51.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
